H0.text: Metal is the material that transfers heat energy quickest.

H1.text: Glass is the material that transfers heat energy quickest among the listed materials.

H2.text: Plastic is the material that transfers heat energy quickest.

H3.text: Wood transfers heat energy quickest among the materials listed.

A4.text: Metals typically have high thermal conductivity and are very efficient at conducting heat

A5.text: The thermal conductivity of copper is over 10000 times that of air
